canITakeMyself() - Method in class moteur.Player
This methode will see if a player can take offer from itself.
Cards - Interface in moteur
The interface Card contains two basic operations of a card, as they have in the real world : it has a value and a color.
CardsAJouer - Class in moteur
The class CardsAJouer is in fact a Cards.

CARREAU - moteur.CarteCouleur
 
CarteCouleur - Enum in moteur
This enumeration containes all of the colors of the cards.
CarteValeur - Enum in moteur
This enumeration containes all of the values of the cards.
check_card(CardsAJouer) - Method in class Vue.checkJestDialog
This function will responsible for checking which card to be showed.
checkButton - Class in Vue
The class checkButton is a class of Thread for creating a JButton which is responsible for showing the Jest for users in the course of the game.
checkButton(Player) - Constructor for class Vue.checkButton
The constructor for checkJbutton.It will create a button who is responsible for creating another window to show exactlly the player's window and who can be used anytime.
checkJest(Player) - Method in class moteur.Arbitre
checkJest(Player player) is used to calcul total points of a jest, particularly, of certain players.
checkJest(Player) - Method in interface moteur.Visitor
checkJest(Player player) is used to calcul total points of a jest, particularly, of certain players.
checkJestDialog - Class in Vue
The class checkJestDialog is responsible for the window which is created when checkButton is clicked.
checkJestDialog(Player) - Constructor for class Vue.checkJestDialog
The constructor for checkJestDialog.It will create a window with the help of function check_card showing the cards in the player's Jest.
checkTrophyCondition() - Method in class moteur.CardsAJouer
Methode aimes to check the condiction of winning a CardAJouer with the trophie
chooseOneFaceup() - Method in class moteur.Player
A player must choose one card face up at the begining of each turn.
chooseOneFaceup() - Method in class moteur.PlayerReel
This methode waits for a player to make his/her choice. if it is his/her turn.
chooseOneFaceup() - Method in class moteur.PlayerVirtuel
This algorithm will be called when it's the player's trun to choose one card faced up, just after each turn, deal cards to every player.
chooseOneFaceup(int) - Method in class moteur.Player
A player must choose one card face up at the begining of each turn.
chooseSomeonesOffer() - Method in class moteur.Player
A player must choose one card from the Offer.
chooseSomeonesOffer() - Method in class moteur.PlayerReel
Only if it is the player's turn shall the player make the choice, so this methode will be controlled and called by GameController.
chooseSomeonesOffer() - Method in class moteur.PlayerVirtuel
This algorithm will be called when it's the player's turn to choose the offer form another player.
chooseSomeonesOffer(Player, int) - Method in class moteur.Player
A player must choose one card from the Offer.
